inclusion.criterion: Clinical and biochemical diagnosis of acromegaly.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Males and females aged 18-70 years willing to give informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 6 months after the onset of symptoms of acromegaly and on stable medication for study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Systolic blood pressure < 180 mmHg, diastolic blood pressure < 110 mmHg.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Change in medication in the preceding 4 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He has been taking only vitamin D and multivitamins after his surgery.
